title Becoming one
author Rosden Shadow [Mark Signorelli]
homepage rosden.itch.io

noaction
run_rules_on_level_Start

background_color #231F26

text_color #BCF2AA

again_interval 0.1

.2221


=======
LEGEND
=======

. = Background
# = Wall
P = Playerright
* = Crate
@=crate2
$ = crate3

O = Target
n = nomove
a = arrow2 and wall
e=end
t = end and target and eend
w=end and winend

c=cloner
-=thefloor
x=thefloorx

feelx= overcrate2 or overcrate  or overcrate3
feel=overwall 
pushable=crate or cloner or swapcrate  or switcrate or switcrate2

cubes = crate or crate2 or crate3
win=crate or wall


theemx= crate 
player=playerright or playerleft

blocker = wall or crate  or nomove or player or arrow

arrowk = arrow or arrow2 or arrowx or arrowx2

mov= movr or movl or movu or movd

theconfeel2=2up or 2up2 or 2down or 2left or 2left2 or 2right or 2right2 or 2leftremoval or 2rightremoval or 2leftremovalx or 2rightremovalx

theconfeel=1up or 1up2 or 1down or 1left or 1left2 or 1right or 1right2 or 1leftremoval or 1rightremoval or 1leftremovalx or 1rightremovalx

theconfeel3=3up or 3up2 or 3down or 3left or 3left2 or 3right or 3right2 or 3leftremoval or 3rightremoval or 3leftremovalx or 3rightremovalx

thedead=cratedead or Crate2dead or Cratedead2 or Cratedead3 or Cratedead4 or Crate2dead2 or Crate2dead3 or Crate2dead4 or Crate3dead or Crate3dead2 or Crate3dead3 or Crate3dead4
=======
SOUNDS
=======

cubes MOVE 36772507

EndLevel 74089700

player MOVE 68988304
sfx0 52836103
sfx1 45427502

sfx2 29503700
sfx3 81951902

sfx4 70729907

sfx5 24927507

sfx6 70040702

================
COLLISIONLAYERS
================

Background
Target
nomove
Player, Wall, pushable,swapwall,thefloor,thefloorx,cubes

thedead
movr
movl
movu
movd

startexpo
expo
nowin

arrow, arrow2, arrowx, arrowx2
winend
eend
end, endx

feelx

2left
2left2
2right
2right2

1left
1left2
1right
1right2

3left
3left2
3right
3right2

2up2
2up

1up2
1up

3up2
3up

2down
1down
3down

2leftremoval
2rightremoval
2leftremovalx
2rightremovalx
1leftremoval
1rightremoval
1leftremovalx
1rightremovalx
3leftremoval
3rightremoval
3leftremovalx
3rightremovalx

feel


======
RULES
======

[feel]->[]
[feelx]->[]
[theconfeel]->[]
[theconfeel2]->[]
[theconfeel3]->[]

[Cratedead4]->[]
[Cratedead3]->[Cratedead4]
[Cratedead2]->[Cratedead3]
[Cratedead no endx]->[Cratedead2]sfx6
[Cratedead ]->[Cratedead2]

[Crate2dead4]->[]
[Crate2dead3]->[Crate2dead4]
[Crate2dead2]->[Crate2dead3]
[Crate2dead]->[Crate2dead2]sfx6

[Crate3dead4]->[]
[Crate3dead3]->[Crate3dead4]
[Crate3dead2]->[Crate3dead3]
[Crate3dead]->[Crate3dead2]sfx6


[ left Playerright] -> [ left playerleft]
[ right Playerleft] -> [ right playerright]

[> player | crate3]->[player|crate3]sfx4
[> player | crate2]->[player|crate2]sfx5

rigid [ > Player | crate ] -> [> Player | > crate ] 
+rigid [ Moving cubes | cubes ] -> [ Moving cubes | MOVING cubes ]


rigid[crate movr]->[right crate ]
+rigid [ Moving cubes | cubes ] -> [ Moving cubes | MOVING cubes ]

rigid[crate movl]->[left crate  ]
+rigid [ Moving cubes | cubes ] -> [ Moving cubes | MOVING cubes ]

rigid[crate movu]->[up crate  ]
+rigid [ Moving cubes | cubes ] -> [ Moving cubes | MOVING cubes ]

rigid[crate movd]->[down crate ]
+rigid [ Moving cubes | cubes ] -> [ Moving cubes | MOVING cubes ]

([crate movr]->[right crate ]
[crate movl]->[left crate  ]
[crate movu]->[up crate  ]
[crate movd]->[down crate ])

[mov]->[]

right[right crate|]->[right crate| movr]
left[left crate|]->[left crate| movl]
up[up crate|]->[up crate| movu]
down[down crate|]->[down crate| movd]


rigid [ < Player | crate2 ] -> [< Player | < crate2  ]     
+rigid [ Moving cubes | cubes ] -> [ Moving cubes | MOVING cubes ]


rigid [ Moving cubes | cubes ] -> [ Moving cubes | MOVING cubes ]


(Getting the goal)
[startexpo]->[]
[expo]->[]
[nowin]->[]

late[player]->[player startexpo]
late[startexpo][cubes]->[][cubes expo]
late[expo|cubes]->[expo | cubes expo]
late[cubes no expo]->[cubes nowin]

late[nowin][cubes]->[nowin][nowin cubes]

late[crate no nowin]->[Cratedead]
late[crate2 no nowin]->[Crate2dead]
late[crate3 no nowin]->[Crate3dead]


[endx] ->[thefloor] sfx2
[end | thefloor]-> [endx |thefloor]


late up [wall| ]-> [wall|overwall]

late up [crate2| ]-> [crate2|overcrate2]
late up [crate2|cubes]->[Crate2 2up2|2up cubes]
late down [crate2|cubes]->[Crate2 2down| cubes]
late right [crate2|cubes]->[Crate2 2right| cubes]
late up [crate2 2right|]->[Crate2 2right| 2right2]
late left [crate2|cubes]->[Crate2 2left| cubes]
late up [crate2 2left|]->[Crate2 2left| 2left2]
late left [ crate2 2up2|cubes]->[Crate2 2up2 2leftremovalx|cubes ]
late left [ crate2 2down|cubes]->[Crate2 2down 2leftremovalx|cubes ]
late right [ crate2 2up2 |cubes ]->[Crate2 2up2 2rightremovalx |cubes  ]
late right [ crate2  2down|cubes ]->[Crate2 2down 2rightremovalx|cubes ]
(late left [ crate2 2up2|cubes]->[Crate2 2up2 2leftremovalx|cubes 2rightremovalx]
late left [ crate2 2down|cubes]->[Crate2 2down 2leftremovalx|cubes 2rightremovalx]
late right [ crate2 2up2 |cubes ]->[Crate2 2up2 2rightremovalx |cubes  2leftremovalx]
late right [ crate2  2down|cubes ]->[Crate2 2down 2rightremovalx|cubes  2leftremovalx])
late down [2leftremovalx| no 2left]->[2leftremoval|]
late down [2rightremovalx| no 2right]->[2rightremoval|]

late up [theemx| ]-> [theemx|overcrate]
late up [crate|cubes]->[Crate 1up2|1up cubes]
late down [crate|cubes]->[Crate 1down| cubes]
late right [crate|cubes]->[Crate 1right| cubes]
late up [crate 1right|]->[Crate 1right| 1right2]
late left [crate|cubes]->[Crate 1left| cubes]
late up [crate 1left|]->[Crate 1left| 1left2]
late left [ crate 1up2|cubes]->[Crate 1up2 1leftremovalx|cubes ]
late left [ crate 1down|cubes]->[Crate 1down 1leftremovalx|cubes ]
late right [ crate 1up2 |cubes ]->[Crate 1up2 1rightremovalx |cubes  ]
late right [ crate  1down|cubes ]->[Crate 1down 1rightremovalx|cubes  ]
(late left [ crate 1up2|cubes]->[Crate 1up2 1leftremovalx|cubes 1rightremovalx]
late left [ crate 1down|cubes]->[Crate 1down 1leftremovalx|cubes 1rightremovalx]
late right [ crate 1up2 |cubes ]->[Crate 1up2 1rightremovalx |cubes  1leftremovalx]
late right [ crate  1down|cubes ]->[Crate 1down 1rightremovalx|cubes  1leftremovalx])
late down [1leftremovalx| no 1left]->[1leftremoval|]
late down [1rightremovalx| no 1right]->[1rightremoval|]

late up [crate3| ]-> [crate3|overcrate3]
late up [crate3|cubes]->[Crate3 3up2|3up cubes]
late down [crate3|cubes]->[Crate3 3down| cubes]
late right [crate3|cubes]->[Crate3 3right| cubes]
late up [crate3 3right|]->[Crate3 3right| 3right2]
late left [crate3|cubes]->[Crate3 3left| cubes]
late up [crate3 3left|]->[Crate3 3left| 3left2]
late left [ crate3 3up2|cubes]->[Crate3 3up2 3leftremovalx|cubes ]
late left [ crate3 3down|cubes]->[Crate3 3down 3leftremovalx|cubes ]
late right [ crate3 3up2 |cubes ]->[Crate3 3up2 3rightremovalx |cubes  ]
late right [ crate3  3down|cubes ]->[Crate3 3down 3rightremovalx|cubes ]
late down [3leftremovalx| no 3left]->[3leftremoval|]
late down [3rightremovalx| no 3right]->[3rightremoval|]

late up [end| ]-> [end|overcrate]
late up [endx| ]-> [endx|overcrate]




[]-> again 
(
[arrow]->[arrowx2]
[arrow2]->[arrowx]

[arrowx]->[arrow]
[arrowx2]->[arrow2])
==============
WINCONDITIONS
==============

no cubes
no thedead
no thefloorx
=======
LEVELS
=======

message Connect all the cubes together
